channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-43422|2024-08-03T13:32:58.771Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20compuware%20topaz%20utilities%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Compuware Topaz Utilities Plugin 1.0.8 and earlier implements an agent/controller message that does not limit where it can be executed, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to obtain the values of Java system properties from the Jenkins controller process.

item.title: CVE-2022-34788|2024-08-03T09:22:10.169Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20matrix%20reloaded%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Matrix Reloaded Plugin 1.1.3 and earlier does not escape the agent name in tooltips, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Agent/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34213|2024-08-03T08:16:17.312Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20squash%20tm%20publisher%20%28squash4jenkins%29%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Squash TM Publisher (Squash4Jenkins) Plugin 1.0.0 and earlier stores passwords unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-36892|2024-08-03T10:14:29.366Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rhnpush-plugin%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins rhnpush-plugin Plugin 0.5.1 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a method implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission but without Item/Workspace or Item/Configure permission to check whether attacker-specified file patterns match workspace contents.

item.title: CVE-2022-23105|2024-08-03T03:36:19.191Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20active%20directory%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Active Directory Plugin 2.25 and earlier does not encrypt the transmission of data between the Jenkins controller and Active Directory servers in most configurations.

item.title: CVE-2022-46683|2024-08-03T14:39:38.463Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20login%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Google Login Plugin 1.4 through 1.6 (both inclusive) improperly determines that a redirect URL after login is legitimately pointing to Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-27206|2024-08-03T05:25:32.328Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin 1.13 and earlier stores the GitLab client secret unencrypted in the global config.xml file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-34179|2024-08-03T08:16:17.136Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20embeddable%20build%20status%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Embeddable Build Status Plugin 2.0.3 and earlier allows specifying a `style` query parameter that is used to choose a different SVG image style without restricting possible values, resulting in a relative path traversal vulnerability that allows attackers without Overall/Read permission to specify paths to other SVG images on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25183|2024-08-03T04:36:06.299Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier uses the names of Pipeline libraries to create cache directories without any sanitization, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM using specially crafted library names if a global Pipeline library configured to use caching already exists.

item.title: CVE-2022-20614|2024-08-03T02:17:52.949Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mailer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Mailer Plugin 391.ve4a_38c1b_cf4b_ and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to use the DNS used by the Jenkins instance to resolve an attacker-specified hostname.

item.title: CVE-2022-27218|2024-08-03T05:25:32.671Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20incapptic%20connect%20uploader%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins incapptic connect uploader Plugin 1.15 and earlier stores tokens unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27201|2024-08-03T05:25:32.222Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20semantic%20versioning%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Semantic Versioning Plugin 1.13 and earlier does not restrict execution of an controller/agent message to agents, and implements no limitations about the file path that can be parsed, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to have Jenkins parse a crafted file that uses external entities for extraction of secrets from the Jenkins controller or server-side request forgery.

item.title: CVE-2022-29044|2024-08-03T06:10:58.796Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20node%20and%20label%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Node and Label parameter Plugin 1.10.3 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Node and Label parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-27197|2024-08-03T05:25:32.462Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dashboard%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Dashboard View Plugin 2.18 and earlier does not perform URL validation for the Iframe Portlet's Iframe source URL, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure views.

item.title: CVE-2022-28158|2024-08-03T05:48:37.486Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-30969|2024-08-03T07:03:39.913Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20autocomplete%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Autocomplete Parameter Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers to execute arbitrary code without sandbox protection if the victim is an administrator.

item.title: CVE-2022-41249|2024-08-03T12:35:49.618Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scm%20httpclient%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SCM HttpClient Plugin 1.5 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-46686|2024-08-03T14:39:38.677Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20custom%20build%20properties%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Custom Build Properties Plugin 2.79.vc095ccc85094 and earlier does not escape property values and build display names on the Custom Build Properties and Build Summary pages, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to set or change these values.

item.title: CVE-2022-25207|2024-08-03T04:36:06.608Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20chef%20sinatra%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Chef Sinatra Plugin 1.20 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins send an HTTP request to an attacker-controlled URL and have it parse an XML response.

item.title: CVE-2022-34206|2024-08-03T08:16:17.219Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jianliao%20notification%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Jianliao Notification Plugin 1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to send HTTP POST requests to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-43407|2024-08-03T13:32:57.391Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20input%20step%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Input Step Plugin 451.vf1a_a_4f405289 and earlier does not restrict or sanitize the optionally specified ID of the 'input' step, which is used for the URLs that process user interactions for the given 'input' step (proceed or abort) and is not correctly encoded, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines to have Jenkins build URLs from 'input' step IDs that would bypass the CSRF protection of any target URL in Jenkins when the 'input' step is interacted with.

item.title: CVE-2022-29046|2024-08-03T06:10:58.937Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Plugin 2.15.3 and earlier does not escape the name and description of List Subversion tags (and more) parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25193|2024-08-03T04:36:06.519Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20snow%20commander%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Snow Commander Plugin 1.10 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-28160|2024-08-03T05:48:37.311Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20tests%20selector%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Tests Selector Plugin 1.3.3 and earlier allows users with Item/Configure permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-25209|2024-08-03T04:36:06.442Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20chef%20sinatra%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Chef Sinatra Plugin 1.20 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-43406|2024-08-03T13:32:57.407Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20deprecated%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Pipeline: Deprecated Groovy Libraries Plugin 583.vf3b_454e43966 and earlier allows attackers with permission to define untrusted Pipeline libraries and to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2022-30964|2024-08-03T07:03:39.779Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20multiselect%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Multiselect parameter Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Multiselect parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-36913|2024-08-03T10:14:29.458Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20openstack%20heat%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Openstack Heat Plugin 1.5 and earlier does not perform permission checks in methods implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to check for the existence of an attacker-specified file path on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-36889|2024-08-03T10:14:29.368Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployer%20framework%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Deployer Framework Plugin 85.v1d1888e8c021 and earlier does not restrict the application path of the applications when configuring a deployment, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to upload arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller file system to the selected service.

item.title: CVE-2022-28149|2024-08-03T05:48:37.384Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20and%20node%20ownership%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job and Node ownership Plugin 0.13.0 and earlier does not escape the names of the secondary owners, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-36917|2024-08-03T10:14:29.467Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20cloud%20backup%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Google Cloud Backup Plugin 0.6 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to request a manual backup.

item.title: CVE-2022-25210|2024-08-03T04:36:06.458Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20convertigo%20mobile%20platform%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Convertigo Mobile Platform Plugin 1.1 and earlier uses static fields to store job configuration information, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to capture passwords of the jobs that will be configured.

item.title: CVE-2022-34182|2024-08-03T08:16:17.200Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nested%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Nested View Plugin 1.20 through 1.25 (both inclusive) does not escape search parameters, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-45380|2024-08-03T14:09:57.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20junit%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins JUnit Plugin 1159.v0b_396e1e07dd and earlier converts HTTP(S) URLs in test report output to clickable links in an unsafe manner, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34190|2024-08-03T08:16:17.230Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20metadata%20plugin%20for%20jenkins%20ci%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Metadata Plugin for Jenkins CI server Plugin 2.1 and earlier does not escape the name and description of List maven artifact versions parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34181|2024-08-03T08:16:17.220Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20xunit%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins xUnit Plugin 3.0.8 and earlier implements an agent-to-controller message that creates a user-specified directory if it doesn't exist, and parsing files inside it as test results, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to create an arbitrary directory on the Jenkins controller or to obtain test results from existing files in an attacker-specified directory.

item.title: CVE-2022-45388|2024-08-03T14:09:56.971Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20config%20rotator%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Config Rotator Plugin 2.0.1 and earlier does not restrict a file name query parameter in an HTTP endpoint, allowing unauthenticated attackers to read arbitrary files with '.xml' extension on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-34792|2024-08-03T09:22:10.237Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20recipe%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Recipe Plugin 1.2 and earlier allows attackers to send an HTTP request to an attacker-specified URL and parse the response as XML.

item.title: CVE-2022-36882|2024-08-03T10:14:29.407Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Git Plugin 4.11.3 and earlier allows attackers to trigger builds of jobs configured to use an attacker-specified Git repository and to cause them to check out an attacker-specified commit.

item.title: CVE-2022-36884|2024-08-03T10:14:29.343Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20plugin
item.description: The webhook endpoint in Jenkins Git Plugin 4.11.3 and earlier provide unauthenticated attackers information about the existence of jobs configured to use an attacker-specified Git repository.

item.title: CVE-2022-30952|2024-08-03T07:03:39.865Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20scm%20api%20for%20blue%20ocean%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline SCM API for Blue Ocean Plugin 1.25.3 and earlier allows attackers with Job/Configure permission to access credentials with attacker-specified IDs stored in the private per-user credentials stores of any attacker-specified user in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-28156|2024-08-03T05:48:37.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20phoenix%20autotest%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Phoenix AutoTest Plugin 1.3 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Configure permission to copy arbitrary files and directories from the Jenkins controller to the agent workspace.

item.title: CVE-2022-30957|2024-08-03T07:03:39.880Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SSH Plugin 2.6.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-45379|2024-08-03T14:09:57.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1189.vb_a_b_7c8fd5fde and earlier stores whole-script approvals as the SHA-1 hash of the script, making it vulnerable to collision attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-43419|2024-08-03T13:32:58.683Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20katalon%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Katalon Plugin 1.0.32 and earlier stores API keys unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-30949|2024-08-03T07:03:39.748Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20repo%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins REPO Plugin 1.14.0 and earlier allows attackers able to configure pipelines to check out some SCM repositories stored on the Jenkins controller's file system using local paths as SCM URLs, obtaining limited information about other projects' SCM contents.

item.title: CVE-2022-30956|2024-08-03T07:03:39.842Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rundeck%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Rundeck Plugin 3.6.10 and earlier does not restrict URL schemes in Rundeck webhook submissions, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to submit crafted Rundeck webhook payloads.

item.title: CVE-2022-23106|2024-08-03T03:36:19.211Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.55 and earlier used a non-constant time comparison function when validating an authentication token allowing attackers to use statistical methods to obtain a valid authentication token.

item.title: CVE-2022-45398|2024-08-03T14:09:56.971Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cluster%20statistics%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Cluster Statistics Plugin 0.4.6 and earlier allows attackers to delete recorded Jenkins Cluster Statistics.

item.title: CVE-2022-34795|2024-08-03T09:22:10.589Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin 1.0.10 and earlier does not escape environment names on its Deployment Dashboard view, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with View/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-30954|2024-08-03T07:03:40.035Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20blue%20ocean%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Blue Ocean Plugin 1.25.3 and earlier does not perform a permission check in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server.

item.title: CVE-2022-43428|2024-08-03T13:32:58.990Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20compuware%20topaz%20for%20total%20test%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Compuware Topaz for Total Test Plugin 2.4.8 and earlier implements an agent/controller message that does not limit where it can be executed, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to obtain the values of Java system properties from the Jenkins controller process.

item.title: CVE-2022-27212|2024-08-03T05:25:32.367Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20list%20git%20branches%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins List Git Branches Parameter Plugin 0.0.9 and earlier does not escape the name of the 'List Git branches (and more)' parameter, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-36914|2024-08-03T10:14:29.519Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20files%20found%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Files Found Trigger Plugin 1.5 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a method implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to check for the existence of an attacker-specified file path on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-34815|2024-08-03T09:22:10.520Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20request%20rename%20or%20delete%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Request Rename Or Delete Plugin 1.1.0 and earlier allows attackers to accept pending requests, thereby renaming or deleting jobs.

item.title: CVE-2022-25176|2024-08-03T04:36:05.777Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20groovy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Groovy Plugin 2648.va9433432b33c and earlier follows symbolic links to locations outside of the checkout directory for the configured SCM when reading the script file (typically Jenkinsfile) for Pipelines, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-36888|2024-08-03T10:14:29.398Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hashicorp%20vault%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins HashiCorp Vault Plugin 354.vdb_858fd6b_f48 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain credentials stored in Vault with attacker-specified path and keys.

item.title: CVE-2022-25187|2024-08-03T04:36:06.450Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20support%20core%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Support Core Plugin 2.79 and earlier does not redact some sensitive information in the support bundle.

item.title: CVE-2022-29051|2024-08-03T06:10:59.203Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20publish%20over%20ftp%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Publish Over FTP Plugin 1.16 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an FTP server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-20618|2024-08-03T02:17:52.908Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 737.vdf9dc06105be and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read access to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-34796|2024-08-03T09:22:10.447Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployment%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Deployment Dashboard Plugin 1.0.10 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-29043|2024-08-03T06:10:58.614Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mask%20passwords%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Mask Passwords Plugin 3.0 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Non-Stored Password parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-25205|2024-08-03T04:36:06.646Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dbcharts%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins dbCharts Plugin 0.5.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified database via JDBC using attacker-specified credentials and to determine if a class is available in the Jenkins instance.

item.title: CVE-2022-36922|2024-08-03T10:14:29.456Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20lucene-search%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Lucene-Search Plugin 370.v62a5f618cd3a and earlier does not escape the search query parameter displayed on the 'search' result page, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-25211|2024-08-03T04:36:05.791Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20swamp%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SWAMP Plugin 1.2.6 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified web server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-20612|2024-08-03T02:17:53.077Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins 2.329 and earlier, LTS 2.319.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger build of job without parameters when no security realm is set.

item.title: CVE-2022-34814|2024-08-03T09:22:10.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20request%20rename%20or%20delete%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Request Rename Or Delete Plugin 1.1.0 and earlier does not correctly perform a permission check in an HTTP endpoint, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to view an administrative configuration page listing pending requests.

item.title: CVE-2022-41232|2024-08-03T12:35:49.618Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build-publisher%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Build-Publisher Plugin 1.22 and earlier allows attackers to replace any config.xml file on the Jenkins controller file system with an empty file by providing a crafted file name to an API endpoint.

item.title: CVE-2022-36905|2024-08-03T10:14:29.459Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20metadata%20plugin%20for%20jenkins%20ci%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Metadata Plugin for Jenkins CI server Plugin 2.2 and earlier does not perform URL validation for the Repository Base URL of List maven artifact versions parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34207|2024-08-03T08:16:17.210Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20beaker%20builder%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Beaker builder Plugin 1.10 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-25206|2024-08-03T04:36:06.547Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20dbcharts%20plugin
item.description: A missing check in Jenkins dbCharts Plugin 0.5.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified database via JDBC using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-28150|2024-08-03T05:48:36.847Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20and%20node%20ownership%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Job and Node ownership Plugin 0.13.0 and earlier allows attackers to change the owners and item-specific permissions of a job.

item.title: CVE-2022-25174|2024-08-03T04:36:06.646Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20shared%20groovy%20libraries%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Shared Groovy Libraries Plugin 552.vd9cc05b8a2e1 and earlier uses the same checkout directories for distinct SCMs for Pipeline libraries, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller through crafted SCM contents.

item.title: CVE-2022-34193|2024-08-03T08:16:17.224Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20package%20version%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Package Version Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier does not escape the name of Package version parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-41225|2024-08-03T12:35:49.646Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20anchore%20container%20image%20scanner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Anchore Container Image Scanner Plugin 1.0.24 and earlier does not escape content provided by the Anchore engine API, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to control API responses by Anchore engine.

item.title: CVE-2022-28136|2024-08-03T05:48:36.558Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jiratestresultreporter%20plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-27200|2024-08-03T05:25:32.336Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20folder-based%20authorization%20strategy%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Folder-based Authorization Strategy Plugin 1.3 and earlier does not escape the names of roles shown on the configuration form, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34188|2024-08-03T08:16:17.183Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20hidden%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Hidden Parameter Plugin 0.0.4 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Hidden Parameter parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-34813|2024-08-03T09:22:10.414Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20xpath%20configuration%20viewer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins XPath Configuration Viewer Plugin 1.1.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to create and delete XPath expressions.

item.title: CVE-2022-34175|2024-08-03T08:16:17.220Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins
item.description: Jenkins 2.335 through 2.355 (both inclusive) allows attackers in some cases to bypass a protection mechanism, thereby directly accessing some view fragments containing sensitive information, bypassing any permission checks in the corresponding view.

item.title: CVE-2022-43404|2024-08-03T13:32:57.353Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies and calls to sandbox-generated synthetic constructors in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1183.v774b_0b_0a_a_451 and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2022-29042|2024-08-03T06:10:58.632Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20job%20generator%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Job Generator Plugin 1.22 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Generator Parameter and Generator Choice parameters on Job Generator jobs' Build With Parameters views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-46685|2024-08-03T14:39:38.558Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitea%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Gitea Plugin 1.4.4 and earlier, the implementation of Gitea personal access tokens did not support credentials masking, potentially exposing them through the build log.

item.title: CVE-2022-28142|2024-08-03T05:48:37.099Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20proxmox%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Proxmox Plugin 0.6.0 and earlier disables SSL/TLS certificate validation globally for the Jenkins controller JVM when configured to ignore SSL/TLS issues.

item.title: CVE-2022-41241|2024-08-03T12:35:49.607Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rqm%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins RQM Plugin 2.8 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.description: Jenkins Debian Package Builder Plugin 1.6.11 and earlier implements functionality that allows agents to invoke command-line `git` at an attacker-specified path on the controller, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to invoke arbitrary OS commands on the controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-34204|2024-08-03T08:16:17.277Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20easyqa%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins EasyQA Plugin 1.0 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server.

item.title: CVE-2022-45399|2024-08-03T14:09:56.989Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cluster%20statistics%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Cluster Statistics Plugin 0.4.6 and earlier allows attackers to delete recorded Jenkins Cluster Statistics.

item.description: Jenkins CollabNet Plugins Plugin 2.0.8 and earlier stores a RabbitMQ password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins ThreadFix Plugin 1.5.4 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-27207|2024-08-03T05:25:32.491Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20global-build-stats%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins global-build-stats Plugin 1.5 and earlier does not escape multiple fields in the chart configuration on the 'Global Build Stats' page, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.description: Jenkins Continuous Integration with Toad Edge Plugin 2.3 and earlier does not apply Content-Security-Policy headers to report files it serves, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission or otherwise able to control report contents.

item.description: Jenkins Publish Over SSH Plugin 1.22 and earlier does not escape the SSH server name, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Overall/Administer permission.

item.description: Jenkins Rundeck Plugin 3.6.11 and earlier does not protect access to the /plugin/rundeck/webhook/ endpoint, allowing users with Overall/Read permission to trigger jobs that are configured to be triggerable via Rundeck.

item.description: Jenkins Gerrit Trigger Plugin 2.35.2 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Base64 Encoded String parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.description: In Jenkins 2.340 through 2.355 (both inclusive) symbol-based icons unescape previously escaped values of 'tooltip' parameters, resulting in a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.description: Jenkins Buckminster Plugin 1.1.1 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a method implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to check for the existence of an attacker-specified file path on the Jenkins controller file system.

item.description: Jenkins Katalon Plugin 1.0.32 and earlier implements an agent/controller message that does not limit where it can be executed and allows invoking Katalon with configurable arguments, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to invoke Katalon on the Jenkins controller with attacker-controlled version, install location, and arguments, and attackers additionally able to create files on the Jenkins controller (e.g., attackers with Item/Configure permission could archive artifacts) to invoke arbitrary OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2022-34196|2024-08-03T08:16:17.281Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rest%20list%20parameter%20plugin

item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins extreme-feedback Plugin 1.7 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to discover information about job names attached to lamps, discover MAC and IP addresses of existing lamps, and rename lamps.

item.description: Jenkins Stash Branch Parameter Plugin 0.3.0 and earlier does not escape the name and description of Stash Branch parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.description: Jenkins Storable Configs Plugin 1.0 and earlier does not configure its XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks.

item.title: CVE-2022-41228|2024-08-03T12:35:49.633Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ns-nd%20integration%20performance%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins NS-ND Integration Performance Publisher Plugin 4.8.0.129 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permissions to connect to an attacker-specified webserver using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-34184|2024-08-03T08:16:17.198Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20crx%20content%20package%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins CRX Content Package Deployer Plugin 1.9 and earlier does not escape the name and description of CRX Content Package Choice parameters on views displaying parameters, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-46684|2024-08-03T14:39:38.563Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20checkmarx%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Checkmarx Plugin 2022.3.3 and earlier does not escape values returned from the Checkmarx service API before inserting them into HTML reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-34203|2024-08-03T08:16:17.206Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20easyqa%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins EasyQA Plugin 1.0 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server.

item.title: CVE-2022-28139|2024-08-03T05:48:36.808Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rocketchat%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins RocketChat Notifier Plugin 1.4.10 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-27205|2024-08-03T05:25:31.110Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extended%20choice%20parameter%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Extended Choice Parameter Plugin 346.vd87693c5a_86c and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL.

item.title: CVE-2022-34818|2024-08-03T09:22:09.889Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20failed%20job%20deactivator%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Failed Job Deactivator Plugin 1.2.1 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several views and HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to disable jobs.

item.title: CVE-2022-34805|2024-08-03T09:22:10.180Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20skype%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Skype notifier Plugin 1.1.0 and earlier stores a password unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-27195|2024-08-03T05:25:31.103Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20parameterized%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Parameterized Trigger Plugin 2.43 and earlier captures environment variables passed to builds triggered using Jenkins Parameterized Trigger Plugin, including password parameter values, in their `build.xml` files. These values are stored unencrypted and can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-25194|2024-08-03T04:36:05.840Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20autonomiq%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins autonomiq Plugin 1.15 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2022-36899|2024-08-03T10:14:29.353Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20compuware%20ispw%20operations%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Compuware ISPW Operations Plugin 1.0.8 and earlier does not restrict execution of a controller/agent message to agents, allowing attackers able to control agent processes to retrieve Java system properties.

item.title: CVE-2022-41236|2024-08-03T12:35:49.689Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20security%20inspector%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Security Inspector Plugin 117.v6eecc36919c2 and earlier allows attackers to replace the generated report stored in a per-session cache and displayed to authorized users at the .../report URL with a report based on attacker-specified report generation options.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-08-02T04:26:15.217Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-08-02T04:26:14.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-08-02T04:26:14.270Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-28161|2024-08-02T00:48:49.181Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-08-02T00:48:49.387Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-08-02T00:48:48.971Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-08-02T00:48:49.469Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin

item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-08-02T00:48:49.402Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
